item.title: Trust Your Instincts Instead of Hearsay
item.description: More my understanding of the world grows by reading various prophecies people have made before, makes me realize that there is no point in taking hearsay seriously, be it from news channels, be it anywhere else. No one knows the future, it’s so obvious, still people are into prediction/criticism business and it’s working well too. In 1909 Washington Post wrote “There will never be such a thing as commercial aerial freighters.
